thread.title: South Africa: Communications Hosts Public Sector Manager Forum On Digital Terrestrial Television, 14 Jul
thread.title_full: South Africa: Communications Hosts Public Sector Manager Forum On Digital Terrestrial Television, 14 Jul

title: South Africa: Communications Hosts Public Sector Manager Forum On Digital Terrestrial Television, 14 Jul
text:
The PSM Forum provides public service managers and various stakeholders with a platform to thoroughly engage with policy makers. 
Members of the media are invited as follows: 
Media programme 
Part One: Media Engagement Session 
Date: Tuesday, 14 July 2015 
Time: 12h30 
Venue: Horseshoe Inn, Memorial Road, Kimberley 
Part Two: Public Sector Manager Forum 
Date: Tuesday, 14 July 2015 
Time: 18h00 
Venue: Horseshoe Inn, Memorial Road, Kimberley South Africa 
Eskom ended stage 1 load shedding on Friday, which started at 08:30, but said it could be re-instated at 17:00. see more » Copyright © 2015 South African Government. All rights reserved.
